channel.name: Test JSON to HL7 Mapping

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: LOg Received Message
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script:
logger.info('Raw message received by JSON to HL7 channel \n: ' + msg);
tmp['MSH']['MSH.7']['MSH.7.1'] = DateUtil.getCurrentDate('yyyyMMddHHmmss');

com.mirth.connect.plugins.messagebuilder.name: Patient Identification - Patient Identifier List - ID Number (PID.3.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - PatientIDList - PatientID (in)
Patient Identification - Patient Name - Family Name (PID.5.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - PatientName - Family (in)
Patient Identification - Patient Name - Given Name (PID.5.2) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - PatientName - Given (in)
Patient Identification - Date/Time of Birth - Time (PID.7.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - DOB (in)
Patient Identification - Administrative Sex - Value (PID.8.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - Sex (in)
Patient Identification - Race - Identifier (PID.10.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - Race (in)
Patient Identification - Patient Address - Street Address (PID.11.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - PatientAddress - Street (in)
Patient Identification - Patient Address - City (PID.11.3) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - PatientAddress - City (in)
Patient Identification - Patient Address - State or Province (PID.11.4) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - PatientAddress - State (in)
Patient Identification - Patient Address - Zip or Postal Code (PID.11.5) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - PatientAddress - ZipPostal (in)
Patient Identification - Patient Address - Country (PID.11.6) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - CountryCode (in)
Patient Identification - Phone Number - Home - Telephone Number (PID.13.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - Phone_Home_Email (in)
Patient Identification - Phone Number - Business - Telephone Number (PID.14.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - Phone_Work_Mobile (in)
Patient Identification - Marital Status - Identifier (PID.16.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - MaritalStatus (in)
Patient Identification - Patient Account Number - ID Number (PID.18.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - PatientAcctNumber - ID (in)
Patient Identification - Patient Account Number - ID Number (PID.18.1) (out) <-- JakariADT - Patient - PatientSSN (in)

properties.subject: Test Mirth E-mail with HL7 attachment for patient ID: ${patientID}
properties.body: The transformed HL7 message data is: ${message.encodedData}

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

codeTemplateLibrary.name: Library 1
codeTemplateLibrary.description:
This library was added upon migration to version 3.3.0. It includes all pre-existing code templates, and is set to be included on all pre-existing and new channels.
You should create your own new libraries and assign code templates to them as you see fit. You should also link libraries to specific channels, so that you're not necessarily including all code templates on all channels all the time.
